ThingDef.label: AI chip
ThingDef.description: Through special chemicals and electric shocks this little chip is able to completely restore the users consciousness and mobility. Requires brain surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: synthetic lung
ThingDef.description: A high-tech breathing replacement. Makes a soft whirring sound.

ThingDef.label: synthetic stomach
ThingDef.description: An enhanced stomach augmented with synthetic fibres to decrease rejection rate.

ThingDef.label: synthetic spleen
ThingDef.description: An enhanced spleen augmented with synthetic fibres to decrease rejection rate.

ThingDef.label: synthetic liver
ThingDef.description: An enhanced liver augmented with synthetic fibres to decrease rejection rate.

ThingDef.label: synthetic kidney
ThingDef.description: An enhanced kidney augmented with synthetic fibres to decrease rejection rate.

ThingDef.label: synthetic heart
ThingDef.description: A top-of-the-line heart replacement. Can last for over 30 years on a single charge.

ThingDef.label: synthetic skin
ThingDef.description: A small piece of an interesting looking skin-like material. Feels like real skin.

ThingDef.label: joywire
ThingDef.description: This little brain implant will make you feel happy and relaxed. Requires brain surgery research before installing.

ThingDef.label: painstopper
ThingDef.description: This brain implant will make you not feel pain. Requires brain surgery research before installing.
